title: Can I still grab Championship Ashe after the 5th?
body:
I was planning to buy Championship Ashe next week but I saw that i have until the 5th to contribute 
Just wanted to know if I can still grab it

replies.body:
Championship skins are legacy, so while she will be going away after that date, there's always a chance for her to return at a later date.  Check out our [legacy skins guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)for more info, and don't worry if you miss her this time around.

In regards to her chroma skin, nothing has been announced currently about a return for that.  If you get the chroma now, you can always get the skin later!
